verses.verse: The <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3056>book<s%> I <S%G4160>wrote,<s%> <S%G5599><s%> <S%G2321>Theophilus,<s%> <S%G4012>concerned<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1321>teach,<s%>

<S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> he was received <S%G353>up,<s%> after <S%G1781>he<s%> had given <S%G1781>commandment<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> to the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1586>chosen.<s%>

To <S%G3739>these<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3936>showed<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3958>suffered,<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5039>proofs,<s%> <S%G3700>appearing<s%> <S%G1223>to<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> over a period of <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>speaking<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G932>Kingdom.<s%>

<S%G2532>Being<s%> assembled <S%G4871>together<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> he <S%G3853>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5563><s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G5563>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> wait <S%G4037>for<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G191>heard<s%> from <S%G3450>me.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> in <S%G5204>water,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> will be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> from <S%G3778>now.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> when <S%G4905>they<s%> had come <S%G4905>together,<s%> they <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>are<s%> <S%G600>you<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> <S%G5550>now<s%> <S%G600>restoring<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel?<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1097>"It<s%> <S%G2076>isn't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G5216>you<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2540>seasons<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G5087>set<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1849>authority.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> you will <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G1904>when<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> has <S%G1904>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5209>You<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2449>Judea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4540>Samaria,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G2078>uttermost<s%> parts of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>"

<S%G2532>When<s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> as they were <S%G991>looking,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was taken <S%G1869>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G5274>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>sight.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>While<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> looking <S%G816>steadfastly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> <S%G4198>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>went,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2066>clothing,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2476>"You<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G1057>Galilee,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do <S%G2476>you<s%> stand <S%G1689>looking<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3772>sky?<s%> This <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who was received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> <S%G2064>will<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> back in the <S%G3779>same<s%> <S%G5158>way<s%> <S%G3739>as<s%> you <S%G2300>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4198>going<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3772>sky.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G5290>they<s%> returned <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1638>Olivet,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> near <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2192>a<s%> Sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>'s <S%G3598>journey<s%> <S%G2192>away.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>When<s%> they <S%G2258>had<s%> come <S%G1525>in,<s%> they went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the upper <S%G5253>room,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G5037>they<s%> were <S%G2650>staying;<s%> that is <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2385>James,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G918>Bartholomew,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3156>Matthew,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G256>Alphaeus,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G2207>Zealot,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> the son of <S%G2385>James.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2258><s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G4342>continued<s%> steadfastly in <S%G4335>prayer<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1162>supplication,<s%> along <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G1135>women,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> stood <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> (and the <S%G3793>number<s%> of <S%G3686>names<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> one <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G1501>twenty<s%>), <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%>

<S%G435><s%> <S%G80>"Brothers,<s%> it was <S%G1163>necessary<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> should be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> spoke <S%G4277>before<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> who <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3595>guide<s%> to those who <S%G4815>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G2674>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2674>numbered<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2975>received<s%> his <S%G2819>portion<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>

<S%G3767>Now<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2932>obtained<s%> a <S%G5564>field<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G3408>reward<s%> for his <S%G93>wickedness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>falling<s%> <S%G4248>headlong,<s%> his body burst <S%G2997>open,<s%> <S%G3319><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4698>intestines<s%> gushed <S%G1632>out.<s%>

<S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G1565>who<s%> <S%G2730>lived<s%> in <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G5620>that<s%> in <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G1258>language<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G5564>field<s%> was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G184><s%> 'Akeldama,' <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G5564>is,<s%> 'The field of <S%G129>blood.<s%>'

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1125>it<s%> 'Let is another written take <S%G1722>in<s%> his the <S%G976>office.<s%>' book of <S%G5568>Psalms,<s%> <S%G1096><s%> 'Let <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1886>habitation<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> made <S%G2048>desolate.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2077>Let<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> one <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G846>therein;<s%>'

"Of the <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> have <S%G4905>accompanied<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1909>among<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%>

<S%G756>beginning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G3739>the<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he was received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1096>must<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>"

<S%G2532>They<s%> put <S%G2476>forward<s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G923>Barsabbas,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G1941>surnamed<s%> <S%G2459>Justus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3159>Matthias.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4771>"You,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> who know the <S%G2589>hearts<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G322>men,<s%> show <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> you have <S%G1586>chosen<s%>

to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G2819>part<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G651>apostleship<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G3845>fell<s%> <S%G4198>away,<s%> that he might go <S%G1519>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>"

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1325>drew<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2819>lots<s%> for <S%G2532>them,<s%> and the <S%G2819>lot<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3159>Matthias,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he was <S%G4785>numbered<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G652>apostles.<s%>
